mapper.select: SELECT n.note_id noteId, n.owner_id ownerId, n.topic_id topicId, n.status status, n.created_at createdAt, n.updated_at updatedAt, u.nickname ownerName, sc.title topicName, sc.subject_id subjectId, sj.name subjectName FROM note n LEFT JOIN user u ON n.owner_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN topic sc ON n.topic_id = sc.topic_id LEFT JOIN subject sj ON sc.subject_id = sj.subject_id WHERE #{noteId} = n.note_id;
SELECT n.note_id, n.owner_id, u.nickname, n.updated_at FROM note n LEFT JOIN user u ON n.owner_id = u.user_id WHERE n.topic_id = #{topicId};
